description: Numbers that are the sum of 2 squares or 3 times a square.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
S. L. Snover, C. Wavereis and J. K. Williams, Rep-tiling for triangles, Discrete Math. 91 (1991), no. 2, 193-200.
links: Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Mar 21 2001
